title: The Fake Heiress at Mar-A-Lago w/ Kimia Behpoornia
description: What’s poppin’ Con-gregation? This week, Kimia Behpoornia joins us to discuss how the FBI is looking into a woman who spent considerable time at Trump’s Mar-A-Lago estate, claiming to be an heiress. Plus, a manga artist has been scammed out of 75 million yen from someone who claimed to be Mark Ruffalo. Stay Schemin’!
author: rss@earwolf.com (Earwolf)
